judges: Before Mitchell, Dean, Fell, Bbown and Mestbezat, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion by
Mr. Justice Mitchell,
This appeal is quashed for the reasons given in Lyon v. Dunn, ante, p. 90.
opinions.author: Mr. Justice Mitchell,

casebody.head_matter:
Lyon v. Dunn.
Argued Feb. 13, 1900.
Appeal, No. 335, Jan. T., 1899, by respondent, from decree of Special Court, Schuylkill Co., as of C. P. Jan. T., 1896, No. 262, in election contest of Thomas H. B. Lyon v. P. M. Dunn.
Before Mitchell, Dean, Fell, Bbown and Mestbezat, JJ.
Appeal quashed.
May 21, 1900:
